entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
